Diagram 3, Animation

The diagram depicts a frame being sent from the source host to the host group, which is known as a multicast. It shows the corresponding Ethernet frame and IP Packet Header. The Source Host has a caption above it, which says, I need to send this frame to a group of hosts.

Multicast IP and MAC destination addresses deliver packet/frames to a specific group of member hosts.
